LanguageData.SmallShamblerSwarm.label: Shade Wanderers
LanguageData.SmallShamblerSwarm.letterLabel: A small group of {0} shades are approaching. They will succumb to the harsh desert heat within a day.\n\nIf you can capture one, you can study it for forbidden knowledge. Otherwise, they might not notice you if you leave them alone.
